description:
Time for a new chain? This reliable option from KMC will get your 8-speed steed back on the trails, roads or bike lanes in no time.

  • Compatible with SRAM, Shimano and other 8-speed drivetrains
  • Includes a reusable KMC Missing Link 8 for easy installation and removal
  • Inner chamfering for smoother shifting in 1x drivetrains
  • Width: 7.3mm
name: KMC X8 8-Speed Chain
